snippet: Marketers and media companies are feeding an apparently ceaseless interest in the Titanic with an outpouring of TV programs, books, and many other collectibles.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; marketers and media companies are feeding an apparently ceaseless interest in the Titanic, coinciding with the 100-year anniversary of the tragic voyage.
lead_paragraph: Marketers and media companies are feeding an apparently ceaseless interest in the Titanic with an outpouring of TV programs, books, and many other collectibles.

headline.seo: Titanic Continues to Have a Long Afterlife - Advertising
headline.main: For a Quickly Doomed Ship, a Very Long Afterlife
headline.print_headline: For a Quickly Doomed Ship, a Very Long Afterlife
